website_summaries.verdict: No other media streamer comes close to the video quality and content variety. The NVIDIA Shield has been the king of both streaming video boxes and PC gaming boxes since it was released.
pros: Built-in Google Home functionality makes controlling your smart home devices a snap
4K HDR support delivers bleeding-edge quality video
cons: PC gaming requires a separate gaming computer or a monthly NVIDIA game-streaming subscription

customer_reviews.title: Not fully functional as a Plex server, beware
customer_reviews.text: Nvidia markets the Shield as a great Plex Media server, but since August 2018, Plex does not transcode on the Shield with hardware acceleration turned on. If on, Plex fails. Plex transcoding on the Shield works with acceleration turned off, but that makes the Shield a much slower Plex server. Suggestion: If you need Plex for transcoding, before purchasing, check the Plex forums, search for the string about the transcoding crashing on the Nvidia Shield, and see if a fix has finally been found. It's been broken for 7 months. Not fixed as of 3-30-2019.

customer_reviews.title: Great for steaming. Bad for gaming.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great box for streaming content to watch. However, it is advertised as being a great box for video games as well. This is not the case for me. Games run well, but there is significant input lag with the controller. Enough to ruin the experience. I've tried emulators as well as native games from the play store. All have input lag. I'm fairly disappointed as I wanted to play games on this with my kids. They don't seem to mind but I can hardly stand it. I would return it, but my wife likes it for streaming her favorite TV shows. So we will keep it.

product_meta.title: NVIDIA SHIELD TV Pro Home Media Server
product_meta.description: NVIDIA SHIELD TV is the most advanced streaming media player that provides endless entertainment and is the perfect fit for your Google-connected lifestyle. Ask your Google Assistant to play your favorite shows in up to 4K HDR, share your photos, stream the latest songs, display your calendar, dim the lights, and so much more, all with just your voice. With SHIELD, it's more than TV. It's your life—smarter and more connected. Enjoy Netflix, Amazon Video, and VUDU in stunning 4K HDR and YouTube, Google Play Movies & TV, and more in up to 4K. Cut the cord with apps like YouTube TV, Sling TV or PlayStation Vue. Cast your favorite apps to your TV with Chromecast 4K built-in. Add SmartThings Link to turn SHIELD into a Zigbee and Z-wave smart home hub to wirelessly connect and automate hundreds of compatible smart devices, so they can all work together with voice commands and automations. Even use SHIELD as a Plex Media Server and stream your personal media collection to any device, anywhere. NVIDIA GameStream™harnesses the power of your GeForce GTX graphics card to let you cast your games from your PC to your TV. Don’t have a powerful gaming rig? Just stream PC games from the cloud with GeForce NOW. You can also play a new class of exclusive Android games.
feature_bullets: Home Theater Experience -Enjoy the ultimate visual experience with 4K HDR quality and the most immersive sound with Dolby Atmos and DTS-X surround sound pass-through.
Google Assistant Built-In -Ask it questions and see the answers on your TV, including Google photos, your calendar, sports scores, and more. Plus, cast apps to your TV with Chromecast 4K built-in.
Cut the Cord -Apps like YouTube TV, Hulu, Sling TV, and PlayStation Vue give you access to live TV and sports without the mess and stress of a cable box.
Smart Home Ready -Use your voice to dim lights, turn up the temperature, view your Nest cam on the TV, and more. Add SmartThings Link to turn your SHIELD into a Zigbee and Z-wave smart home hub.

NVIDIA-Powered Gaming -Stream games from your GeForce-powered PC to your TV in 4K HDR at 60 FPS. You can even get NVIDIA-powered cloud gaming on demand with GeForce NOW and explore SHIELD-exclusive Android games.
